remarks: Multiplication of an infinite series by a constant.  (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 14-Nov-2007.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 1-Feb-2014.)
statement:
clim2ser.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
isermulc2.2 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
isermulc2.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
isermulc2.5 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) ~~> A ) $.
isermulc2.6 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
isermulc2.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) = ( C x. ( F ` k ) ) ) $.
isermulc2 $p |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , G ) ~~> ( C x. A ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d C k $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
